title: Rewards and stuff will come all in once ?
body:
Hey Guys
can i ask if the season rewards+runes refund+icons and other stuff.. will come all in once on the same day ?
and can i ask also if we are going to see the URF Warwick on the PBE with this special border+icon on the next week ?

replies.body:
Some of those rewards might pop up a little bit later, and some players might get there's sooner, but all the rewards should be given out over the course of the month.

https://i.gyazo.com/d1b72302781e530428184be064ee6db6.png

Thanks 

 can i ask also if we are going to see the URF Warwick on the PBE with this special border+icon on the next week ?
